page.title: 03Cwmbromley Farm,Sarn
page.content: We have a{farm}near Sarn called Cwmbromley.We have 432 ewes,615 lambs, 41 suckler cows,2 bulls and 120 cattle.The sheep are fed on corn,nuts and hay during the winter.The ewes are put to Suffolk,Mule or Blue Faced Leicester rams in the Autumn.They start{lambing}at the end of January right through to the middle of May.We rear 615 to 620 lambs a year.About 500 of these are sold at the market.The other 100 are kept for ewes in replacement for the old ewes we sell and the 2 years old we sell in the Kerry Sheep Sale.At the end of July we separate the lambs we have not sold from the ewes.We start selling lambs about the 3rd week of April.We sell them either at Bishops Castle or Welshpool{Market.}
